definition-item.definition-title: INDEXING SCHEME RELATING TO PRINTING, LINING MACHINES, TYPEWRITERS, AND TO STAMPS

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Cylinders of rotary presses or machines with means for preventing or damping vibrations or shocks

definition-item.definition-title: Means enabling or facilitating exchange of tubular printing or impression members, e.g. printing sleeves, blankets

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Devices for attaching cylindrical printing formes
